project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that interacts with the user, asks multiple-choice questions, tracks the score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Set up the game structure and main function
Define the questions and answers as a variable within the code
Implement the functionality to present questions to the user and capture their answers
Implement scoring logic to track the user's score based on their responses
Implement logic to display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz functionality to ensure accuracy in scoring and question display
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
